channel.title: A server yell for 508
channel.description: i need a 508 server yell so it can tell ppl forums every 10mins or something, i just need the command and where to put it?

item.title: A server yell for 508
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“jj0001, post:2, topic:317783”]Don’t forget the most useful thing on mopar is the search, but if that fails you look at this post i posted the other day.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,414057.msg3048545.html#msg3048545[/quote]yh i know that but i want it so the server yells not me. like every 10 mins it will say “Respect players” and stuff
